Articles.Content: I've tried to EVA in flight a few times (not realizing the Kerbals have no parachutes) and everytime I do the craft explodes. This is true in the atmosphere or in descent to the Mun.  EVA seems to work fine on the ground.
I also have this same problem, was doing a minmus mission and when i tried to eva to fly my kerbal over to my lander the engine exploaded immediately followed by the craft spinning controllably
Glad I'm not the only one.

I attempted EVA on 90km orbit around Kerbin under no acceleration and also experienced rapid unscheduled disassembly. No damage to my kerbal
